select ic.comment_level as commentLevel, ic.content as content, ic.sepc_name as sepcName, ic.created_time as createdTime, u.face as userFace, u.nickname as nickname from items_comments ic left join users u on ic.user_id = u.id where ic.item_id = #{paramsMap.itemId}
and ic.comment_level = #{paramsMap.level}

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tmpSpec.price as price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join (select item_id, min(price_discount) as price from items_spec group by item_id) tmpSpec on i.id = tmpSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = true and i.item_name like '%${paramsMap.itemName}%'
order by sellCounts desc
order by price
order by itemName

select i.id as itemId, i.item_name as itemName, i.sell_counts as sellCounts, ii.url as imgUrl, tmpSpec.price as price from items i left join items_img ii on i.id = ii.item_id left join (select item_id, min(price_discount) as price from items_spec group by item_id) tmpSpec on i.id = tmpSpec.item_id where ii.is_main = true and i.cat_id = #{paramsMap.catId}
order by sellCounts desc
